thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Back to Green
Cooling trade tensions with China fueled a rush back into U.S. stocks, with the Dow industrials vaulting to their largest daily point gain since the financial crisis. Despite the threat of rising rates, the Dow reversed more than half of the losses suffered in a two-day swoon last week over the dispute between the two largest global economies. Fears of a trade war eased after the Journal reported that China and the U.S. began negotiations over American access to Chinese markets, with financial stocks...
